website_summaries.verdict: The collagen supplement to choose for women wanting to prevent signs of aging.
pros: Helps to reduce the appearance of deep lines and wrinkles
Reduces advanced lines around the nose and eyes
cons: Noticeable effects around the face may take a few weeks of consistent use

customer_reviews.title: My beauty secret
customer_reviews.text: I have used these supplements since I was 35. When people ask me what I do for my skin, this is what I tell them to use. Collagen is almost like freezing your current face by taking them. So you wont get any collagen that you have lost but you will prevent your face, skin, etc from losing more. When people tell me I don't look 44 it's because I froze my face with collagen naturally by taking these daily!
customer_reviews.author: Gucci Girl

customer_reviews.title: The BEST collagen supplement!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST!!!!!! I was taking another supplement and had to take 6 pills a day. Now I only need 1 and it's easy to swallow. I am 66 and everyone tells me they think I am more like 50. Most of my friends are in their 50's and continue to refer to me saying "she's the same age as us and looks better than us". This is my fountain of Youth! That's me ...the blonde with short hair - November2019
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mawyer

customer_reviews.title: Only one pill per day!
customer_reviews.text: I think this product helps me with my hair skin and nails. Other products require taking several pills to get results. You only have to take one to get the same dosage.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea N

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different collagen pills and I keep coming back to this one. I like that it lasts three months and that the dose is just a single pill.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: My skin is looking much better, wish I knew about taking collagen in my 20s, lol
customer_reviews.author: MsSweetJames

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking SANAR collagen capsules for about 3years. This is the only collagen supplement that I will use. It is easy to swallow and has no taste. No mixing or preparation. I can definitely see a difference in the elasticity of my skin especially in the neck area. It also makes my nails grow faster. I am 62 yes old and get compliments on how nice my skin looks. Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Must Try!
customer_reviews.text: Dislike nothing! Love everything! Great results! My hair and nails are growing and skin looks amazing! I used to buy at Walmart then couldn’t find them anymore. Thankful that I found them here.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Lighting skin
customer_reviews.text: What I like most is to take only 1 pill compare to other brands that need more than 1 to have full dosis.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fast delivery and that I only had to take one capsule a day. It was a larger capsule but easy to swallow and gentle on the stomach. Unfortunately, I am about to the last couple weeks of the 150 capsule bottle and I felt the need to report that I have no signs of it helping in stronger nails or nail growth, which was the main focus of this purchase. There was no visual signs of any other recommended help taking the boosted Collagen would help either. I did continue talking them in attempt to allow visible changes, but to no avail. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RLK

customer_reviews.title: Improvement of wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Just started my second bottle and have noticed improvement of my smile wrinkles. They are now like fine lines and less noticable. They used to go all the way almost to my ears >_< This brand is easy to take, flavorless and once daily, focusing on wrinkles. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Meay

customer_reviews.title: Great for 20 somethings trying to jump start their anti-aging regime!
customer_reviews.text: I am 27 and wanted to nip aging in the bud, if you will. I began taking collagen pills and loving them! The one thing I truly love about this brand is you only have to take ONE pill, not 6, not 4 - ONE! It's a capsule so it's easier to swallow and I have noticed a difference in my skin, hair and nails. I typically take biotin as well but I think they work well together - especially if you are trying to get longer, healthier hair. I also really like that it has vitamin C and E in it. Less vitamins for me to take on a daily basis. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: It gives me headache!
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to say the product is bad. However, since I started taking it I always have a headache right after. I even did a test and didn't take it for a day, and I did not have a headache. I looked online and it says that sometimes collagen from a bovine source can give people headaches. This product may be good for some people, but it is not working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Bendana

customer_reviews.title: Suspicious product
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw it away, couldn't trust to take it. Zero information on the bottle regarding the product...the comp5that makes it or the ingredients. Pretty sketchy and wasted money...
customer_reviews.author: Eleni K Veilleux

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Wrinkle Free Skin Improving Solution...
customer_reviews.text: I must admit at first I was skeptical about utilizing a new Product; however, to my Surprise, It's been the best Collagen Pill ever, I noticed how my expression lines diminished significantly after the first week and have gotten Compliments even about my Skin Complexion and/or Texture... I am so Happy to have made the Right Decision... 2 Enthusiastic Thumbs Up 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Adaiah Solis

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the ingredients
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I purchased this product and I haven’t even used it yet because there’s not 100% collagen it has Rosehip in it and I’m not quite sure if that will interfere with medications that I take
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Only one per day unlike most collagen pills out there
customer_reviews.text: Almost half way gone now and I noticed my nails are growing faster and stronger. Fewer pimples in my face and my skin is glowing
customer_reviews.author: Rose P

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable results
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I began taking because I’m over 40 and I lost a significant amount of weight. I need to get rid of the loose skin but it has also helped with my hand, knee and back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Youth Drops 🌙
customer_reviews.text: I take these at night because I read where supplements (whether topical or ingested) are absorbed better while you sleep. I honestly feel like they’ve helped with the glow game - I know, sounds super cheesy, but I really have seen a difference in overall brightness and plumpness in my skin - probs just about three weeks into taking them. I also got a bottle for my mom to help with her joints and she said she felt a difference as well. Seems like a simple win-win for me!
customer_reviews.author: Blondism

customer_reviews.title: It’s Not just for wrinkles—it helps w/ thinning skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m getting older and my skin has become very thin. I realize this product is for wrinkles. But, I want to share my experience. I couldn’t even brush up against anything without my arms starting to bleed. I have used other Collagen type products for years and assumed they were helping (the best they could). However, when I changed to this product I noticed a shocking improvement!! Not only has my face started to look smoother and younger-—my arms are no longer full of open wounds and disgusting scabbing anymore. In addition, you only need to take 1 pill per day—-not 3 or more.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins... works
customer_reviews.text: I love thats it’s only 1 pill a day. My nails are healthy and shiny. I see improvements in my skin after 2 weeks. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Concerned user

customer_reviews.title: So far an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I came across a article on my news page the other day about how important taking Collagen is for various reasons. Went on to Amazon and researched the many different products. I’m a review reader. Choose to go with this one. Started taking it yesterday and last night already noticed a difference in my pain level. I live in central Minnesota and our winter is cold and long. I’m excited to see how this helps my complexion, nails, and hair due to the extremely cold winter.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These pills are a time machine!
customer_reviews.text: I suffered from severe sunken eyes. The collagen underneath my eyes were completely non-existent from smoking since a young age. I'd done a lot to improve my health including smoking cessation, but the tell-tale signs were still there. USING THESE PILLS WORKED WONDERS!! I take two in the morning and two at night. And within a month's time, the fullness under my eyes were completely restored, along with diminished forehead wrinkles and fine lines in my lower eyelids. The quality and length of my hair and nails have also improved, as well as a tremendous improvement with achey joints! These pills are a time machine!
customer_reviews.author: Kadie Kane

customer_reviews.title: Best Product
customer_reviews.text: I have in the past taken different brands of Collagen and stopped taking either pills or liquids because I found them not working for me. I recently started the Sanar brand of collagen. The day I received it since there are not any directions on when or how to take it, I sent the company an email. I received a response back right away with a couple of suggestions on how to take it. I decided to take it in the evening. At this point, since I recently started began the product, I can happily report that it helps me a good night's sleep!
customer_reviews.author: moosemtnjudy

customer_reviews.title: Oh No!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product it made my skin look amazing. I noticed my eyes kept feeling dryer & dryer( I suffer from dry eye)... Long story short, it worsened my dry eye because the ingredient Rose Hips was the cause. I stopped using it.. Hopefully, this will help someone before they buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I purchased these collagen pills. I have seen improvement in my skin, softer and less wrinkles. The pills are easy to swallow with no side effects. I like the cute bottle too. Will continue to purchase and hope these will start to increase collagen in my corneas as well for better eye health. I do highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: linmin

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product has been meeting my expectations, I’ve been taking once a day and even notice a difference in my face. To be honest, I was skeptical because were offered a free product for a review so I thought maybe the reviews weren’t honest. But, feel free to do yourself a favor and google the product, it has great reviews anywhere you can find it. I’ve been noticing a difference primarily in my face, I feel like some spots I had are going away and my nails are feeling stronger than ever. I will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: No Difference
customer_reviews.text: Almost done with the bottle and there is no noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: Frederic Tams

customer_reviews.title: Nail growth and strength within 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed results with my nails within two weeks. It has been over a month now and my nails are stronger and grow faster. My hair is definitely growing too. While my skin is still very dry (always has been- especially in the winter), I have noticed a LOT less breakouts since I started taking these vitamins. I tend to feel nauseous when taking certain vitamins (especially without food) and so far I have been taking this with food and haven’t had any issues. Also you can’t beat the price! I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amandazab

customer_reviews.title: Collagen
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking collagen forever and I like it and I found this one I take it before I go to bed I know it’s working I’m 58 years young no gray hair I do not look my age and I know collagen is a big part of it so I would highly recommend anybody do you college and this is a good product highly recommended and I’ve been ordering from Amazon for a few years and I have never had a problem with them I really get a good products and I am I like that I’m just a person from Illinois and this collagen is going rate
customer_reviews.author: Linda Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bottle however I’ve been taking collagen from other brands for years. I stayed away from this because of the price BUT my other collagen brands just were not working that well and I looked into this and it’s actually a better deal than the generic brands. You only need ONE vitamin as opposed to 3 of the other brands. I love that. I’ve been taking for a week and already my nails are much stronger. They haven’t been breaking off like they used to. I’m excited to see what my hair, skin and nails look like a month from now.
customer_reviews.author: Kocho

customer_reviews.title: Makes taking collagen so easy!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple collagen powders, mixed them plain, with juice, etc., and couldn’t take them. These capsules are awesome. I don’t know why I didn’t start with them! There is no flavor or smell and they are easy to swallow. I’ve only been taking them for a couple of weeks and my nails are growing! I am going to continue to use them in hopes they make a difference in my joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had other brands that the capsule dissolved as it hit your tongue. These go down easy, and have been a great help. My friend gave me some leftovers from their bottle, and I had to get my own! These are fantastic. Coupled with the Modēre diet, they are a perfect dietary supplement for this collagen-rich diet plan and have been a very good addition to my daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Lago

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable Difference or worse
customer_reviews.text: I just started these so I haven’t noticed anything yet. Will update. Here's an update: No noticeable difference after 3 months, in fact, my nails are a mess. They haven't been this bad since I took off the "nails". They are soft, split, very short, can't grow them. Hair is not responsive. I had much better luck with the "pink capsules" for my nails and hair. Absolutely no noticeable difference in my skin so far. Final update. Finished bottle. Again, no difference, nails are tear easily, a lot of hair in brush, and not doing anything for my skin as far as I can see.
customer_reviews.author: tsli76

customer_reviews.title: This product is so good it’s scary
customer_reviews.text: Normally when it comes to collagen intake, it takes time for it to show results. I’ve been using this product for not so long (I also sometimes forget to take it) and I’m impressed by how fast I see results! My nails and hair grow faster and my skin looks great. This is a product worth buying :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less is More ...
customer_reviews.text: I selected this particular supplement, because after much comparison, it was the only one that required taking one supplement per day, as opposed to 3 or 6, throughout the day. One capsule provides what others do in multiple pills. One capsule, which is easy to swallow, is definitely a better option to obtaining desired results.
customer_reviews.author: GlitzyGiGi

customer_reviews.title: You can not go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this the best collagen on the market for many reasons. It is age defying. You will see a difference. Your skin will be smoother and soft. It has really improved my hair as well. I also have knee issues and my knees are better as well. Some collagen pills do not absorb well. Theses do. They are also the best priced.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbey

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I did my research prior to selecting the college and products. I went with this particular brand based on a 103 views that were randomly selected for me to read. The other thing that attracted me to this particular brand is that it requires only one pill per day and each bottle gives you an 150 day supply. It's too soon for me to say anything about the results of the product but I can at least reassure anyone Who orders from this seller that I received mine in a timely manner sealed with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Stihl

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent.....
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I came across this product. I tried different collagen products in the past with no results. All that changed when I purchased this bottle of collagen last month. I've been using this for over 2 weeks now and already getting compliments on my skin. It looks brighter and smoother. My nails and hair is growing like crazy as well. The pain in my hands and knees is gone. I will continue to use this product. I take 2 pills with a cup of orange juice 2 hours before bedtime. I will recommend this product to others for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Nett

customer_reviews.title: I see a big difference !!
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost 80 and although I don't have a lot of wrinkles, I did have sagging in the lower part of my face along with puppet lines at the corners of my mouth. I've been taking these for a couple months and I see a smoothness, plumpness, and a definite decrease in the sagging and lines...even the tiny lines on the upper lip. My hip doesn't hurt as much, I feel strong and flexible and I will definitely keep taking collagen for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Difference in my knees.
customer_reviews.text: Within days I noticed my knees were not hurting. I am 72 and play tennis EVERY DAY FOR 2 HRS. No brace worn anymore. Nails are not as brittle and muscle pain in shoulders is now to a bearable level. Praying for thicker hair as my throid issue made is very fine and unmanageable. For the next review.....lol
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H Benson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Collagen Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this along with 5000mg of biotin daily'; my nails are noticeably stronger, my hair is falling out less, and I'm overall feeling great about these changes. I've been looking for a collagen supplement for a while, and these are so affordable, plus the bottle lasts 150 days. I love getting value for my money, and I'd definitely say these are a great deal. I plan on repurchasing once my current bottle runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Britt K

customer_reviews.title: This actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried numerous neck creams with no results that I could see. I started taking these collagen supplements over a month ago and I see my neck bands fading as well as some sagging diminishing! I guess it’s super important to work from the “inside out” when it comes to your skin!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara_Ann22

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am trying this product to help with hair, skin and nails. Also it says it helps with joints I have not been taking it very long but I can say they don’t bother my stomach and they go down easy I can’t wait to see the changes in my hair and I like it’s non gmo they seem like a company who cares not only about their product but about who takes it so give it a try and see what results you can get
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: The Quanity Amount.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this collagen supplement for several years now. I take it in the night time. And I've always loved them. And they last me 150 days! So for the price and amount you cant beat it. Now if they could up the ingredients of the collagen, that would fantastic! But I do like these supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Duniven

customer_reviews.title: Fight the wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help fight the aging process. I did a lot of research on collagen products, and this one came up repeatedly as being effective. While results have been subtle, I have noticed a difference in my face. I love it and have told my friends. The capsules are tasteless with no aftertaste. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: martian12

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin and hair
customer_reviews.text: These collagen capsules have been my favorite that I’ve tried. You get plenty for the price AND it’s only one capsule a day. I noticed an improvement in my skin and hair since I’ve been taking them. They’re easy to swallow and you don’t “burp up” any funky taste.
customer_reviews.author: kelly craighead

customer_reviews.title: Great for nails and hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking the pills for on a short time ,maybe three weeks now. I have alopecia and have bald spots on both sides of my head. after about two weeks i noticed that my bald spots had began to fill in , to day is Sept. 24th and i really have hair growing that has filled in the bald spots. And my nails were paper thin from getting them manicured for years. and would not grow a half inch before breaking. off. These pills are worth trying ,you will not be disappointed with the results. Great price also. A happy customer. Wiill post a picture later.
customer_reviews.author: BeJae

customer_reviews.title: Hard nails. Improved hair texture.
customer_reviews.text: Received order promptly. Noticed my face was dropping decided to go with the reviews and I’m glad I did. Noticed that my hair is a texture better than before and my nails are harder, although I’m waiting on the growth. I’m hoping this helps with my joints too. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kadie

customer_reviews.title: Feel the difference.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 46 year old woman and bought this to help with slowing down wrinkles. I do feel the difference and my skin is softer. Even after a week. My hands tend to be severely dry and I feel as though it’s helping. And I love the one easy to swallow pill a day! And you can’t beat the 180 day supply! A definite must purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Vnani

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve noticed a big difference in my skin already. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sara T

customer_reviews.title: Saw same item at Target! It's less expensive here though!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 30 years old and this is the first Collagen I've ever taken. I just started taking it so I can't comment on it's effectiveness. But I can say that the directions do indeed say you only need to take one pill a day AND I happened to have seen the same exact item for sale at Target in the pharmacy section! I feel like that lends some legitimacy to it's effectiveness!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Searching No Further
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews for several different collagen pills/ powder and this brand by far had some of the best reviews. I like that the pills were easy to swallow and didn’t have a bad taste. I am starting up running again and am looking forward to the recovery aid that these pills will have. So far, so good. I am going to update my review after a few months to let you guys know how well they’re working!
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement!
customer_reviews.text: IM happy I decided to give this braND a chance. I really felt the difference after taking it for almost 2 months. I used to take a different brand, bigger pills, not capsules, and hence hard to swallow in the mornings. I will definitely be sticking to this one's for sure! Highy recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Felicitas Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Today is Sunday, May 17, 2020. I've used this Collagen Wrinkle Formula a few years back & couldn't find it anymore where I used to shop. Fortunately, I found it on Amazon! It really works for my hair, skin & nails. My hair grows faster, nails are harder & the big plus is that it keeps fine lines & wrinkles at Bay. I'm 56 years old & my elderly Mom always tells me I look like I'm in my late thirties! Thanks Amazon for selling this product on your website! This is my 2nd message to the seller & have not heard a word yet about receiving free bottle of Collagen Wrinkle Formula....
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Improved Moisture Retention
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product when I was not able to find BioSil. It is a close tie which product has worked better for me. The lines around my eyes seem less visible and my hair and fingernails also seem to benefit from my taking this product. For the first time, my hair is both soft and shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Tambuku

customer_reviews.title: Stronger nails
customer_reviews.text: I originally took to help with nails. Mine continually break and split. In the short time I’ve been taking, I can see a little improvement. I didn’t expect to see any difference, but with the little I see now, I have high hopes and will continue to take! Pills are kind of big, but very easy to swallow. Also no nasty taste, that’s a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Glowing skin
customer_reviews.text: I tried taking the organic collagen powder however, the clumpiness of it did not allow me to continue plus I have a friend who’s been taking this and her skin has been glowing ever since. These are easy to swallow and best of all you only need one pill a day. This brand is highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: MissS

customer_reviews.title: Collagen!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this product! First the last collagen supplement I was taking, I had to take six big pills a day which I had a hard time to keep up with! It’s so easy to swallow coming from a person that’s always had a hard time taking pills, it goes down so smooth! Also comes with enough to last for three months! I will update as time passes to see if I notice any difference in hair, skin or nails!
customer_reviews.author: Delissa

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for about a month now. I get complaints daily on how well my skin looks. I just went through 9 months of chemo and a stem cell transplant and my skin was trashed. It brought it back to life and my hair is growing back fast just after 2 months of complete loss. Usually takes 3 to 6 months. Love this product! My nails are growinf like crazy too!
customer_reviews.author: sherri niedenthall

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says. Silky smooth
customer_reviews.text: It’s used for us LADIES, who have wrinkles. You CANT TASTE a thing. It seems to slide down . It does what it says, it makes your SKIN SILKY SMOOTH. Price is good. I SUGGEST all you LADIES have got to try it. It’s BEAUTIFUL. I will be telling everyone about this GREAT PRODUCT.DOORDASHER
customer_reviews.author: MaryJane Hoad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take and no after taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for hair health. I haven’t used it long enough to see results but I do love the product for many reasons so far. The capsules are easy to swallow and have no after taste, unlike many other collagen capsules I’ve tried. Furthermore, I love that it’s only once a day, one pill. So, the 150 cap bottle will last months and is very well priced. It’s a great option for anyone who wants to try out collagen.
customer_reviews.author: Amy G

customer_reviews.title: Saw a difference in one week
customer_reviews.text: It’s just one pill! Simple to swallow. Easy peasy. It helped with my menstruation symptoms and joint pain in just 1 week. Im anticipating further improvements in the next few weeks ...I have now given some to mom and brother- so they can test it out as well .
customer_reviews.author: shireen

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I was using collagen powder in my coffee, which came out to about $15 for 20 days. For about the same cost, this bottle provides 5 months of servings. I love that I only have to take one pill per day and that it includes Vitamin C (needed for best absorption) rather than having to take separate supplements. I find that this pill form really does focus more on skin health than the powder, which is the area I wanted to focus on. When taking the powder, I did notice that I was not sore after workouts, and that soreness immediately returned when I switched to these — that’s the only thing I miss. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to improve my skin, and I really love it! I’ve been using it since April, and not only has it improved the appearance of my skin, but it has also helped my hair and nails grow faster. Will definitely continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this right away, I bought it for my skin and hair and nails. Collagen is so good for your face. My skin feels and looks nice. I'm almost finished with my bottle. Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee P. Swain

customer_reviews.title: Excited to try
customer_reviews.text: Collagen capsules arrived quickly. They are easy to swallow and did not have an unpleasant flavor. I will update my review after the bottle is gone to comment on any changes I’ve seen in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: UT mountain girl

customer_reviews.title: It works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this collagen because a friend told me that it is good for your fingernails. I have been struggling since I had chemo in 2016 for breast cancer to get my nails to grow like they use to. I have been taking this product for 3 months and I can’t believe the difference in my nails. They’re growing out so nicely now and hardly ever split. After chemo that’s the biggest problem I was having. No more. Thank you so much for a product that is working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Kittle

customer_reviews.title: Collagen and other vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Order came quickly and I didn't realize this before but the pills also have vitamin E, vitamin C, and rose hips, which was a nice bonus. Capsules are easy to swallow and contains gelatin. Also the bottle has a "next one free" coupon on it, so effectively I'll get a second bottle with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I did notice a difference on my hands after just one capsule. As soon as it arrived, I took one capsule at night and in the morning my knuckles were less spongy and looked better and younger. Before I had tried 7-14 g (1-2 scoops) collagen powder from another company daily without seeing or feeling any difference so I am really impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: F.O

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to take collagen supplements
customer_reviews.text: So far these collagen supplements have been so much easier to take than any powder form I’ve taken before. No gross taste.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: You will notice & feel a difference after only one week!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 2 years now and I have to say, I love it. When I stop taking it my body knows. I have friends and family buying this product and after just a week they tell me they notice and feel a difference. Great product, try it for yourself. Price point is great compared to those brands you have to take more than 1 pill of. This bottle lasts you about 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Y. B. P.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice so far
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching collagen supplements. This one seemed the easiest (with only 1 pill) and had great reviews. I take one at night before bed and it’s flavorless. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love with this product!
customer_reviews.text: This has helped my joints and my skin! I love this stuff and will be a forever buyer of this product. Being in my 40’s I’m realizing supplements are a must and beyond helpful. Just wish I’d known this in my 20’s. I’d of used them.
customer_reviews.author: Realtor1

customer_reviews.title: Fake promotion
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. But the Free bottle is not true. It was very disappointed to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collagen product! Ive gotten so many compliments on how healthy my hair and skin look. This is a must have for any women or man! You will love the results!
customer_reviews.author: TARA

customer_reviews.title: Not Experiencing Results
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for about a month and I really am not seeing a lot of difference with my hair and nails. Maybe my expectations were a little too high. I'll finish the bottle but I don't think I will be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Detroiter

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. After researching, based on the reviews, it was an easy choice to select this collagen supplement. I was looking for some thing that wasn’t a powder, but capsule form, so I am satisfied with this product. In addition, the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Elsasser

customer_reviews.title: Can’t tell a difference
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell any difference if the product is working. You are supposedly entitled to a free bottle, but you are given different directions on how to go about obtaining that bottle- none actually resulting in that free bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like , I noticed no change ended up throwing them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki 💋

customer_reviews.title: Great Collagen Supplements!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I especially LOVE how it’s only one pill a day versus many I just don’t have the time to be taking a ton of pills. I just started taking these so I I haven’t noticed anything yet but I’m sure I will.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail I.

customer_reviews.title: You only need to take them once a day
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about these collagen capsules is that you only need to take one once a day, unlike other treatments where you have to take up to six a day. Drinking in the mornings, so far no bad side effects and light to the stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Xenomy

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great!!
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed is how much better my nails started looking! I noticed my face started looking so much clearer and softer looking! I’m looking forward to even what it will do using it long term! Happy customer!! Thank You! :)))
customer_reviews.author: P Miller

customer_reviews.title: No side effects, but haven't taken it long to see benefits yet!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say on the product because I've only been taking it for a month now. No side effects like fullness, heartburn or having any bad taste in my mouth. I am taking this as part of a regiment for Hashimoto's disease. Trying this with Selenium, natural multivitamin, Ashwagandha Root, Vitamin D and a blend of digestive enzymes/probiotics. See if this will help get my Army body back faster. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: G. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: My favorite collagen pills
customer_reviews.text: I love these collagen pills!! They’re really easy to swallow, and don’t have a bad taste. I didn’t see immediate results in regards to my wrinkles, but overtime I feel like my skin is healthier looking and more plump. Not sure I notice a difference with pain relief, but I don’t really have issues with pain yet. I am 27 so I feel like taking them is more of a preventative measure anyway, so I never expected immediate results. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Champion

customer_reviews.title: Love this formula
customer_reviews.text: Love taking this product. It is easily taken when already dispensed in a capsule to consume. Besides collagen, it contains Vitamins C and E, and Rose Hips. The value for the price is great at 150 capsules. The most satisfying thing, besides the great benefits that are included, is that you don't have to spoon the powder into a drink and mix. I love the easiness of use. Will recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JenR

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice Toward Better Skin
customer_reviews.text: I like this has all I need in one daily capsule, easy to swallow, no annoying effects. Adding collagen is proven effective for many of us. It’s a good buy - look at the number of capsules for the price & the mg in each is a daily dose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy nails!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pills to minimize wrinkles. While I’m not totally sure it’s helped with my complexion since I didn’t take before and after photos and I imagine the effects show up quite gradually, I have noticed for sure that my nails are longer and stronger than ever before and I’m having less joint pain in my knees and shoulder. If it’s benefiting my nails and joint pain that I’ve had for years I’m pretty sure it must also be benefitting my skin so I will definitely be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Pills arrived as scheduled. Took 1st dose after dinner & immediately got sick! Vomiting, dizziness, & horrible headache. Decided to try again another day, but with an empty stomach to see if that would help. Omgosh! Horrible! Within 30 mins, I was sick again. Headache, Vomiting, dizziness & stomach cramps. Will not take again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reviews & price made choosing this product easy!
customer_reviews.text: I already feels more energetic! I bought this because staying home during this pandemic has made my daily routines slower. I felt I needed a supplement to boost me up! So far so good! Reviews & price helped make my decision to try this product & I’m glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied so far
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and for a good price. Too early to tell the results but they’re easy to swallow and I’ve had no adverse reactions. Will post when I have taken them for a longer time. They also offered a free bottle after the first order.
customer_reviews.author: reluctant shopper

customer_reviews.title: Listen I'm Trying These Things To Fight Old Age! Hahaha!
customer_reviews.text: Finished an entire bottle and cannot tell or see a difference. I like to imagine it worked. Will I repurchase? I'll probably try a different brand. Nb; it was cheaper on Amazon than the $17.99 I saw it for at Target. Not sure if prices have changed at either stores. Stay 😷 safe y'all!
customer_reviews.author: Freeyah Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Face acne... it’s not worth it to me!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t use this, it broke my face out bad!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Helped me
customer_reviews.text: I do believe it has a small effect on the knee pain I have but the best part is how my skin seems softer and more plump on my face and my nails are stronger. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jennog

customer_reviews.title: Face is clearing up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with breakouts that I’d get on my face and paired it with taking Vitamin D. After about a month of use, I’ve noticed that my face is really clearing up and I’m not getting hardly any pimples, just one here or there on occasion. I definitely recommend trying out!
customer_reviews.author: Emily W

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've nearly finished my first bottle, and I do feel like my hair has been growing more quickly. As far as skin goes, I'm taking it more as a preventative measure, so I don't notice any improvements, but I haven't noticed new signs of aging, either. It is definitely more affordable than most collagen supplements I've looked into.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiAbs

customer_reviews.title: Works great for nails.
customer_reviews.text: My nails are very brittle and this collagen is really helping them get strong, even taking one a day. Although I am considering taking two per day to make them even stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Value!
customer_reviews.text: This product had great reviews and I had been looking for a collagen supplement to help improve my skin from the inside out. I've been taking it about a month now and I'm very happy with the results so far. Nothing too dramatic, but I did start noticing my face looking slightly more taught than before. I love the clean ingredients and you can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer New

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way my skin looks and feels. I do not have wrinkles yet but now that I’m in my 30s I wanted to get a head start and begin taking care of skin.
customer_reviews.author: Meri

customer_reviews.title: Relieves pain in hips and joints!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for a month....originally I was taking these for improvement in my skin... but what I really noticed was the improvement in my hips... I’ve always had hip pain. We have gone through soo many mattresses... and splurged for a $4000 temperpedic.... it was never the mattress....these pills have completely elongated the pain in my hips! I no longer toss and turn. I started my husband on them... and he sleeps through the night. I take them now as a daily supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair, skin, and nails
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in February. I like that it lasts three months and that the dose is just a single pill. My skin is looking better and it has really helped to my nails. It has somewhat helped with my knee pain. I am hoping the with continued use it will also help more with knee pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mable

product_meta.title: Collagen Powder - Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides - Supports Hair Growth, Skin, Nails, and Joints, Grass Fed Collagen, Non GMO, Vital Protein Powder Supplement for Women, Unflavored, 10.58 Ounces
feature_bullets: PURE COLLAGEN POWDER: Our Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides works with plenty of protein to support fast hair growth, renew skin hydration , boost strong nails and improve joint felixibility. Perfect for for workout routines and suitable for all diets. Hormone Free , Grass Fed, Pasture Raised, and Non GMO.

REPLENISH, REPAIR, & RECOVER - Naturally contains 14 essential amino acids to help repair and replenish hair, skin, and nails along with aiding in post-workout and recovery. Supports your digestive system while helping maintain a youthful body boosting skin hydration and helping reduce wrinkles.

ANTI AGING SUPPLEMENT: Collagen is one of the most important nutrients needed to ensure the vitality of your skin, hair, tendon, cartilage, bones, and joints. As we age, our bodies naturally begin to produce less collagen. Pure collagen helps reduce signs of aging by naturally renewing your body's collagen cycle.

TASTE FREE & EASY TO MIX: Collagen Hydrolysate Powder Type I and III is easy to mix in water, coffee, shakes, juice, smoothies, tea or recipes. Easily dissolves in your favorite foods like soup, yogurt or oatmeal.

SUPPORTS HEALTHY LIFESTYLE: Pure Collagen promotes lush hair, healthy skin, strong nails, joints and digestive health by providing the right amount of extra proteins for your body. Can be used with keto diet and is paleo friendly.
